Comment: When hundreds of thousands of people still had their jobs, and groceries weren't $100 a bag. When measles wasn't running free, and America had strong defenses against pandemics and disease. When our leaders had the spine to stand up against our adversaries, instead of kneeling to them and helping them. And other countries still respected (or at least cordially tolerated) us. If America didn't need to be made great again before Trump, it will definitely need to be made great again afterwards.
Author: Ouibeaux
